content:
Chat is great for quick tasks, however for this kind of subject matters like on https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/764, GitHub issues is better place IMO. But still welcome to comment here if it's easier/more convenient for you.

Guidlines for using Backdrop name, domain names, logo, mascot? 路 Issue #764 路 backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Years would take until the Russian-language Backdrop community would grow, and that's despite the main English-speaking Backdrop community - to my view - is evolving quite dynamically. However,...
I agree @Alan Mels that the issue queue is a better place for this discussion. I will comment there.
I've posted my own quick and sloppy thoughts. I look forward to hearing from others.
